author: nspiegelberg
msg: add instrumentation to collect memstore insert time, RWCC wait time, and row lock acquisition time
- RWCC wait time (the time we wait after an write operation to, for RWCC read
Sending the diff out for review, while I test this out on my dev cluster. If it
works fine, next thing will be to push this to dark launch cell #1 to understand
why the put latencies are high.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Parallelize Server Requests on HBase Client
Vastly improves HBCK performance on the dark launch.  Although we
gets a big lock. Cache misses can be expensive on heavily-loaded servers
because they need to setup a proxy connection.  This hurts cache hits on a
cache misses.  We should parallelize both situations.

author: nspiegelberg
